attributes.action: Abolish leaseholds and replace with a system that is fair to residents
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background:
The current leasehold system gives far more rights to the landlord and management agency than tenants.

-As the majority of management companies charge a management fee as a percentage of costs it is in their advantage to spend the maximum amount possible.

-This results in unnecessary works being completed and no incentive for the management company to reduce costs.

-Refusal to pay unreasonable costs can lead to the tenant forfeiting the lease therefore risking eviction.
